Subject: Hockey
data: 1 Which of the following teams has won the women's world cup hockey 2014 title? A Australia B India C Netherlands D USA Answer: Option [A]
2 Which of the following countries will host 2018 Men's and Women's Hockey World cup respectively? A England and India B India and Australia C India and England D Australia and USA Answer: Option [C]
3 Leslie Claudius, was a member of three Olympic Gold Medal winning teams of A Wrestling B Hockey C Gymnastics D Kabaddi Answer: Option [B]
4 Which of the following teams won the inagural edition of the Hockey India League(HIL)? A Ranchi Rhinos B Mumbai Magicians C Punjab Warriors D Delhi Waveriders Answer: Option [A]
5 Which of the following stadiums is associated with Hockey? A Eden Gardens B Sardar Patel Stadium C Dhyan Chand National Stadium D Nehru Stadium Answer: Option [C]
